Table 1. Distribution of learnable parameters of our 3DMV model. Note that the 
majority of the network weights are part of the combined 3D stream just before the 
per-voxel predictions where we rely on strong feature maps; see top left of Fig. 2.

Table 2. Comparison of our final trained model (5 views, end-to-end) against other 
state-of-the-art methods on the ScanNet dataset [1]. We can see that our approach 
makes significant improvements, 22.2% over existing volumetric and approx. 14.8% 
over state-of-the-art PointNet++ architectures.
